atk-s0504a1:18_1: So hi dhāraṇakaṁ paṭicca dhanikassa, dhanikaṁ paṭicca dhāraṇakassa paṭinidhibhūto dhanikasantakassa tato haraṇādisaṅkhātena bhuñjanena bhogoti paṭibhogo, paṭibhogo eva pāṭibhogo.

atk-s0504a1:19_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā attānaṁ pāṭibhogabhāve ṭhapesi?
atk-s0504a1:19_2: Passati hi bhagavā ‘‘mayā ‘ekadhammaṁ, bhikkhave, pajahatha, ahaṁ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā’ti vutte ime bhikkhū addhā taṁ ekadhammaṁ pahāya sakkā tatiyabhūmiṁ samadhigantuṁ, yato dhammassāmi paṭhamamāha ‘ahaṁ pāṭibhogo’ti ussāhajātā tadatthāya paṭipajjitabbaṁ maññissantī’’ti.
atk-s0504a1:19_3: Tasmā ussāhajananatthaṁ anāgāmitāya tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ attānaṁ pāṭibhogabhāve ṭhapesi.

atk-s0504a1:21_0: Tattha purimā tisso pucchā buddhānaṁ natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0504a1:21_1: Tīsu hi addhāsu kiñci saṅkhataṁ addhāvimuttaṁ vā asaṅkhataṁ sammāsambuddhānaṁ adiṭṭhaṁ atulitaṁ atīritaṁ avibhūtaṁ avibhāvitaṁ nāma natthi.

atk-s0504a1:21_4: Yasmā pana buddhā bhagavanto akathaṁkathī tiṇṇavicikicchā sabbadhammesu vigatasaṁsayā, tena nesaṁ vimaticchedanāpucchāpi natthi.
atk-s0504a1:21_5: Itarā pana dve pucchā atthi, tāsu ayaṁ kathetukamyatāpucchāti veditabbā.
atk-s0504a1:22_0: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhamatthaṁ sarūpato dassento ‘‘lobhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekadhamma’’ntiādimāha.
atk-s0504a1:22_1: Tattha lubbhanti tena, sayaṁ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho.
atk-s0504a1:22_2: Svāyaṁ ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle pakkhittamaṁsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno telañjanarāgo viya, saṁyojaniyesu dhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno, taṇhānadibhāvena vaḍḍhamāno yattha samuppanno, sīghasotā nadī viya mahāsamuddaṁ apāyameva taṁ sattaṁ gahetvā gacchatīti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:22_3: Kiñcāpi ayaṁ lobhasaddo sabbalobhasāmaññavacano, idha pana kāmarāgavacanoti veditabbo.
atk-s0504a1:23_0: Puna bhikkhaveti ālapanaṁ dhammassa paṭiggāhakabhāvena abhimukhībhūtānaṁ tattha ādarajananatthaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:23_1: Pajahathāti iminā pahānābhisamayo vihito, so ca pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayehi saddhiṁ eva pavattati, na visunti catusaccādhiṭṭhānāni cattāripi sammādiṭṭhiyā kiccāni vihitāneva honti.
atk-s0504a1:23_2: Yathā ca ‘‘lobhaṁ pajahathā’’ti vutte pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato dosādīnampi pahānaṁ atthato vuttameva hoti, evaṁ samudayasaccavisaye sammādiṭṭhikicce pahānābhisamaye vutte tassā sahakārīkāraṇabhūtānaṁ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṁ sesamaggaṅgānampi samudayasaccavisayakiccaṁ atthato vuttameva hotīti paripuṇṇo ariyamaggabyāpāro idha kathitoti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:23_3: Iminā nayena satipaṭṭhānādīnampi bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ byāpārassa idha vuttabhāvo yathārahaṁ vitthāretabbo.
atk-s0504a1:24_0: Apicettha lobhaṁ pajahathāti etena pahānapariññā vuttā.
atk-s0504a1:24_1: Sā ca tīraṇapariññādhiṭṭhānā, tīraṇapariññā ca ñātapariññādhiṭṭhānāti avinābhāvena tissopi pariññā bodhitā honti.
atk-s0504a1:24_2: Evamettha saha phalena catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā pakāsitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:24_3: Atha vā lobhaṁ pajahathāti saha phalena ñāṇadassanavisuddhi desitā.
atk-s0504a1:24_5: cittavisuddhisīlavisuddhisannissayā cāti nānantarikabhāvena saha phalena sabbāpi satta visuddhiyo vibhāvitāti veditabbaṁ.

atk-s0504a1:40_0: Asubhakammaṭṭhānabhāvanārate kalyāṇamitte sevantassāpi, ṭhānanisajjādīsu dasaasubhanissitasappāyakathāyapi pahīyati.
atk-s0504a1:41_0: ‘‘Atthi, bhikkhave, asubhanimittaṁ, tattha yonisomanasikārabahulīkāro, ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa anuppādāya uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa pahānāyā’’ti.
atk-s0504a1:42_0: Evaṁ pubbabhāge kāmarāgasaṅkhātassa lobhassa pahānāya paṭipanno vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena taṁ anavasesato samucchindati.
atk-s0504a1:42_1: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘lobhaṁ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṁ pajahatha, ahaṁ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā’’ti.
atk-s0504a1:43_0: Etthāha ‘‘ko panettha lobho pahīyati, kiṁ atīto, atha anāgato, udāhu paccuppanno’’ti?
atk-s0504a1:43_2: na tāva atīto lobho pahīyeyya, na anāgato vā tesaṁ abhāvato.
atk-s0504a1:43_3: Na hi niruddhaṁ anuppannaṁ vā atthīti vuccati, vāyāmo ca aphalo āpajjati.
atk-s0504a1:43_4: Atha paccuppanno, evampi aphalo vāyāmo tassa sarasabhaṅgattā, saṁkiliṭṭhā ca maggabhāvanā āpajjati, cittavippayutto vā lobho siyā, na cāyaṁ nayo icchitoti. Vuccate –
atk-s0504a1:43_6: Seyyathāpi idha taruṇarukkho asañjātaphalo, taṁ puriso kuṭhāriyā mūle chindeyya, tassa rukkhassa chede asati yāni phalāni nibbatteyyuṁ, tāni rukkhassa chinnattā ajātāni eva na jāyeyyuṁ, evameva ariyamaggādhigame asati uppajjanāraho lobho ariyamaggādhigamena paccayaghātassa katattā na uppajjati.
atk-s0504a1:43_8: Vipassanāya hi ārammaṇabhūtā pañcakkhandhā tassa uppajjanaṭṭhānatāya bhūmi nāma.
atk-s0504a1:43_9: Sā bhūmi tena laddhāti katvā bhūmiladdhuppanno.
atk-s0504a1:43_10: Ārammaṇādhiggahituppanno avikkhambhituppanno asamūhatuppannoti ca ayameva vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:44_5: Aññesu hi tādisesu ṭhānesu saṅgītikārehi upanibandhagāthā honti, idha pana bhagavatā va gāthārucikānaṁ puggalānaṁ ajjhāsayavasena vuttamevatthaṁ saṅgahetvā gāthā bhāsitā.
atk-s0504a1:45_0: Tattha yena lobhena luddhāse, sattā gacchanti duggatinti yena ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇena tato eva abhisaṅgarasena lobhena luddhā ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu giddhā gadhitā.
atk-s0504a1:45_2: Akkharacintakā pana īdisesu ṭhānesu se-kārāgamaṁ icchanti.
atk-s0504a1:45_3: Tathā luddhattā eva kāyasucaritādīsu kiñci sucaritaṁ akatvā kāyaduccaritādīni ca upacinitvā rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya sattāti laddhanāmā pāṇino dukkhassa nibbattiṭṭhānatāya duggatīti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ nirayaṁ tiracchānayoniṁ pettivisayañca paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gacchanti upapajjanti.
atk-s0504a1:46_0: Taṁ lobhaṁ sammadaññāya, pajahanti vipassinoti taṁ yathāvuttaṁ lobhaṁ sabhāvato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇatoti imehi ākārehi sammā aviparītaṁ hetunā ñāyena aññāya ñātatīraṇapariññāsaṅkhātāya paññāya jānitvā rūpādike pañcupādānakkhandhe aniccādīhi vividhehi ākārehi passanato vipassino avasiṭṭhakilese vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya maggapaññāya samucchedappahānavasena pajahanti, na puna attano santāne uppajjituṁ denti.
atk-s0504a1:46_1: Pahāyana punāyanti, imaṁ lokaṁ kudācananti evaṁ sahajekaṭṭhapahānekaṭṭhehi avasiṭṭhakilesehi saddhiṁ taṁ lobhaṁ anāgāmimaggena pajahitvā puna pacchā imaṁ kāmadhātusaṅkhātaṁ lokaṁ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena kadācipi na āgacchanti orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ suppahīnattā.
atk-s0504a1:47_0: Ayampi atthoti nidānāvasānato pabhuti yāva gāthāpariyosānā iminā suttena pakāsito attho.
atk-s0504a1:47_3: Imasmiṁ sutte samudayasaccaṁ sarūpeneva āgataṁ, pahānāpadesena maggasaccaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:47_5: Gāthāya pana dukkhasamudayamaggasaccāni yathārutavaseneva ñāyanti, itaraṁ niddhāretabbaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:51_3: Yathā ettha, evaṁ ito paresupi sabbattha apubbapadavaṇṇanaṁyeva karissāma.
atk-s0504a1:51_4: Yasmā idaṁ suttaṁ dosabahulānaṁ puggalānaṁ ajjhāsayaṁ oloketvā dosavūpasamanatthaṁ desitaṁ, tasmā ‘‘dosaṁ, bhikkhave, ekadhammaṁ pajahathā’’ti āgataṁ.
atk-s0504a1:51_5: Tattha dosanti ‘‘anatthaṁ me acarīti āghāto jāyatī’’tiādinā (vibha.
atk-s0504a1:51_6: 960) nayena sutte vuttānaṁ navannaṁ, ‘‘atthaṁ me nācarī’’tiādīnañca tappaṭipakkhato siddhānaṁ navannamevāti aṭṭhārasannaṁ khāṇukaṇṭakādinā aṭṭhānena saddhiṁ ekūnavīsatiyā aññatarāghātavatthusambhavaṁ āghātaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:51_7: So hi dussanti tena, sayaṁ vā dussati, dussanamattameva vā tanti dosoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:51_8: So caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsīviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya, attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto, yathāvuttaāghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno visasaṁsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṁ viya daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:52_0: ‘‘Pañcime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0504a1:52_2: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, mettā tasmiṁ puggale bhāvetabbā…pe…
atk-s0504a1:52_4: upekkhā, asatiamanasikāro tasmiṁ puggale āpajjitabbo, evaṁ tasmiṁ puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0504a1:52_5: Yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, puggale āghāto jāyetha, kammassakatā tasmiṁ puggale adhiṭṭhātabbā ‘kammassako ayamāyasmā kammadāyādo…pe…
atk-s0504a1:54_0: ‘‘Pañcime, āvuso, āghātapaṭivinayā, yattha bhikkhuno uppanno āghāto sabbaso paṭivinetabbo.
atk-s0504a1:54_2: Idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo aparisuddhakāyasamācāro hoti parisuddhavacīsamācāro;
atk-s0504a1:54_3: evarūpepi, āvuso, puggale āghāto paṭivinetabbo’’ti (a. ni. 5.162) –
atk-s0504a1:55_0: Evamādināpi nayena pañca āghātapaṭivinayā vuttā, tesu yena kenaci āghātapaṭivinayavidhinā paccavekkhitvā.
atk-s0504a1:56_0: ‘‘Ubhatodaṇḍakena cepi, bhikkhave, kakacena corā ocarakā aṅgamaṅgāni okanteyyuṁ, tatrāpi yo mano padūseyya, na me so tena sāsanakaro’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-s0504a1:60_0: Paraṁ saṅkupitaṁ ñatvā, yo sato upasammati. (saṁ. ni. 1.188);
atk-s0504a1:61_0: ‘‘Sattime , bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṁ āgacchanti itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
atk-s0504a1:61_2: Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati, ‘aho vatāyaṁ dubbaṇṇo assā’ti.
atk-s0504a1:61_4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya nandati.
atk-s0504a1:61_5: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kiñcāpi so hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano, atha kho so dubbaṇṇova hoti kodhābhibhūto.
atk-s0504a1:61_6: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṁ āgacchati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā.
atk-s0504a1:62_0: ‘‘Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṁ icchati ‘aho vatāyaṁ dukkhaṁ sayeyyā’ti…pe…
atk-s0504a1:62_5: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyyāti.
atk-s0504a1:62_7: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati.
atk-s0504a1:62_8: Kodhanoyaṁ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
atk-s0504a1:62_9: So kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā…pe…
atk-s0504a1:63_0: ‘‘Kuddho atthaṁ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṁ na passati…pe…. (a. ni. 7.64);
atk-s0504a1:64_0: ‘‘Kodhaṁ jahe vippajaheyya mānaṁ, saṁyojanaṁ sabbamatikkameyya. (dha. pa. 221);
atk-s0504a1:66_0: ‘‘Kodhaṁ chetvā sukhaṁ seti, kodhaṁ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0504a1:70_0: Evamādinā nayena dose ādīnave vuttappaṭipakkhato dosappahāne ānisaṁse ca paccavekkhitvā pubbabhāge dosaṁ tadaṅgappahānādivasena pajahitvā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena sabbaso dosaṁ samucchindatha, pajahathāti tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ tattha niyojanaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:70_3: Sesamettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ paṭhamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0504a1:73_2: Tañhi dukkhe aññāṇaṁ, dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhe aññāṇaṁ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya aññāṇantiādinā nayena vibhāgena anekappabhedampi muyhanti.
atk-s0504a1:73_3: Tena sayaṁ vā muyhati muyhanamattameva vā tanti mohoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:73_4: So cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo, aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso, ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso vā, asammāppaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno, andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāno, sabbākusalānaṁ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:74_0: ‘‘Mūḷho atthaṁ na jānāti, mūḷho dhammaṁ na passati;
atk-s0504a1:75_0: Andhatamaṁ tadā hoti, yaṁ moho sahate naraṁ’’. (itivu. 88);
atk-s0504a1:80_0: ‘‘Mūḷho kho, brāhmaṇa, mohena abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavatī’’ti ca –
atk-s0504a1:81_0: Ādinā nayena ‘‘yo koci dhammo kāmacchandādisaṁkilesadhammehi nibbattetabbo, atthato sabbo so mohahetuko’’ti ca mohe ādīnavaṁ tappaṭipakkhato mohappahāne ānisaṁsañca paccavekkhitvā kāmacchandādippahānakkameneva pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena mohaṁ pajahantā tatiyamaggena yathāvuttalobhadosekaṭṭhaṁ mohaṁ samucchedavasena pajahathāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:84_2: Doso eva hi kodhapariyāyena bujjhanakānaṁ puggalānaṁ ajjhāsayavasena evaṁ vutto.
atk-s0504a1:84_4: Apica kujjhanalakkhaṇo kodho, āghātakaraṇaraso, cittassa byāpattibhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, cetaso pūtibhāvoti daṭṭhabboti ayampi viseso veditabbo.
atk-s0504a1:87_2: Yadipi hi so gūthaṁ gahetvā paraṁ paharanto viya attano karaṁ paṭhamataraṁ makkhatiyeva, tathāpi paresaṁ guṇamakkhanādhippāyena pavattetabbattā ‘‘paraguṇamakkhano’’ti vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:87_3: Tathā hi so udakapuñchanamiva nhātassa sarīragataṁ udakaṁ paresaṁ guṇe makkheti puñchati vināseti , parehi vā katānaṁ mahantānampi kārānaṁ khepanato dhaṁsanato makkhoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:87_5: Atthato pana paresaṁ guṇamakkhanākārena pavatto domanassasahagatacittuppādoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:87_6: Pajahathāti tattha vuttappabhedaṁ dosaṁ, dose ca vuttanayaṁ ādīnavaṁ, pahāne cassa ānisaṁsaṁ paccavekkhitvā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena pajahantā vipassanaṁ ussukkāpetvā tatiyamaggena anavasesaṁ samucchindathāti attho.
atk-s0504a1:87_7: Makkhāseti makkhitā makkhitaparaguṇā, paresaṁ guṇānaṁ makkhitāro, tato eva attanopi dhaṁsitaguṇāti attho.
atk-s0504a1:90_2: So hi ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā nayena maññanti tena, sayaṁ vā maññati, mānanaṁ sampaggahoti vā mānoti vuccati.
atk-s0504a1:90_3: Svāyaṁ seyyohamasmīti māno, sadisohamasmīti māno, hīnohamasmīti mānoti evaṁ tividho.
atk-s0504a1:90_4: Puna seyyassa seyyohamasmīti māno, seyyassa sadiso, seyyassa hīno;
atk-s0504a1:90_5: sadisassa seyyo, sadisassa sadiso, sadisassa hīno;
atk-s0504a1:90_6: hīnassa seyyo, hīnassa sadiso, hīnassa hīnohamasmīti mānoti evaṁ navavidhopi unnatilakkhaṇo, ahaṁkāraraso, sampaggaharaso vā, uddhumātabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vā, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno ummādo viyāti daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0504a1:90_7: Pajahathāti tassa sabbassapi attukkaṁsanaparavambhananimittatā, garuṭṭhāniyesu abhivādanapaccupaṭṭhānaañjalikammasāmīcikammādīnaṁ akaraṇe kāraṇatā, jātimadapurisamadādibhāvena pamādāpattihetubhāvoti evamādibhedaṁ ādīnavaṁ tappaṭipakkhato niratimānatāya ānisaṁsañca paccavekkhitvā rājasabhaṁ anuppatto caṇḍālo viya sabrahmacārīsu nīcacittataṁ paccupaṭṭhapetvā pubbabhāge tadaṅgādivasena taṁ pajahantā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmimaggena samucchindathāti attho.
atk-s0504a1:90_9: Mattāseti jātimadapurisamadādivasena mānena pamādāpattihetubhūtena mattā attānaṁ paggahetvā carantā.
atk-s0504a1:91_0: Imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā chasu suttesu gāthāsu vā anāgāmiphalaṁ pāpetvā desanā niṭṭhāpitā.
atk-s0504a1:91_1: Tattha ye ime avihā atappā sudassā sudassī akaniṭṭhāti upapattibhavavasena pañca anāgāmino, tesu avihesu upapannā avihā nāma.
atk-s0504a1:91_2: Te antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañcavidhā, tathā atappā, sudassā, sudassino.
atk-s0504a1:91_4: Tattha yo avihādīsu uppajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṁ anatikkamitvā arahattappattiyā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati, ayaṁ antarāparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:91_5: Yo pana avihādīsu ādito pañcakappasatādibhedaṁ āyuvemajjhaṁ atikkamitvā parinibbāyati, ayaṁ upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:91_6: Yo asaṅkhārena adhimattappayogaṁ akatvā appadukkhena akasirena parinibbāyati, ayaṁ asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:91_7: Yo pana sasaṅkhārena adhimattappayogaṁ katvā dukkhena kicchena kasirena parinibbāyati, ayaṁ sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:91_8: Itaro pana avihādīsu uddhaṁvāhitabhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṁ, vaṭṭasotaṁ, maggasotameva vāti uddhaṁsoto.
atk-s0504a1:91_9: Avihādīsu uppajjitvā arahattaṁ pattuṁ asakkonto tattha tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena akaniṭṭhaṁ gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
atk-s0504a1:92_0: Ettha ca uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, uddhaṁsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, na uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī, na uddhaṁsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti catukkaṁ veditabbaṁ. Kathaṁ?
atk-s0504a1:92_1: Yo avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṁ gantvā parinibbāyati, ayaṁ uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:92_2: Yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāyati, ayaṁ uddhaṁsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:92_3: Yo ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāyati , ayaṁ na uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0504a1:92_4: Yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāyati, ayaṁ na uddhaṁsoto, na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāmāti.
atk-s0504a1:93_0: Tattha avihesu uppajjitvā kappasatato uddhaṁ parinibbāyiko, dvinnaṁ kappasatānaṁ matthake parinibbāyiko, pañcakappasate asampatte parinibbāyikoti tayo antarāparinibbāyino.
atk-s0504a1:93_1: Vuttañhetaṁ ‘‘upapannaṁ vā samanantarā appattaṁ vā vemajjha’’nti (pu. pa. 36).
atk-s0504a1:93_3: Evaṁ tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṁsoto.
atk-s0504a1:93_4: Tesu asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañca, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino pañcāti dasa honti.
atk-s0504a1:93_5: Tathā atappāsudassāsudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattārīsaṁ akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṁsotassa abhāvato tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti asaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāro, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino cattāroti aṭṭha, evamete aṭṭhacattārīsaṁ anāgāmino.
atk-s0504a1:93_6: Te sabbepi imesu suttesu avisesavacanena gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0504a1:96_3: So yena yena sambandhaṁ gacchati, tassa tassa anavasesataṁ dīpeti;
